name: series_get_points_table
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cricbuzz_cricket.
Tool description: This API helps to query for live cricket scores, commentary, latest cricket news and editorials, schedules of upcoming matches, rankings, stats, records, etc
API description: Fetch the points table for a given series using the Cricbuzz API.

seriesid.description: The unique identifier of the cricket series for which the points table is to be fetched.
